Fairy Hierarch Noeti Mimilead:
To save trees fairies from the Corruptive poison of Darkness, you need the Fertilizer Timonial. Thanks to him, not all the trees died.
Sure, the soul of an Elven Tetrarch of Asterios hurts the same as mine. And glad to help him. Production of Fertilizers, Teminal - a dangerous occupation. You agree to take the risk?
